title: Should be able to surrender whenever you want.
body: This is a large reason why player base is going down. Nobody wants to be trapped in a losing game for 15 minutes, and even then, nobody presses yes. Just had a game where a player quit at 3 minutes, and was forced to play for another 20 minutes until enemy stomped us and destroyed our nexus. Was not any fun whatsoever.
